participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, they enjoy quiet activities and deep conversations. They are empathetic and enjoy helping others.
participant_1.background: I live alone. I haven t spoken to my family in years. I have over 4000 friends on facebook. I enjoy hitchhiking. Formal situations make me uncomfortable.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and imaginative, she loves to dream big and has a playful nature. She's friendly and caring towards animals.
participant_2.background: I want to be an astronaut when I grow up. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield. I have a poster of Neil Tyson Degrasse on my wall. My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play games, and hang out with my dogs.
That sounds like fun. I like to read and play games too. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play board games, video games, and card games.
I like board games too. I've been playing a lot of Pandemic lately.
I've heard about Pandemic. It sounds like a fun game.
It is. It's a co-op game where you have to work together to stop a virus from spreading.
That sounds challenging. I'm not sure if I'm good enough for that.
Don't worry, it's not that hard. I'm sure you'll do fine.
Okay, I'll give it a try.
Great! I can teach you how to play.
Sounds good. I'm looking forward to it.
Me too.
Are you ready to play Pandemic?
Yes, I'm ready.
Okay, let's set up the game.
So, the goal of the game is to cure four diseases before they spread too far and kill everyone.
Oh, that sounds really difficult.
It can be, but it's a lot of fun.
We're doing really well! We've already cured two diseases.
This is exciting! I don't think I've ever made it this far before.
Well, you're doing a great job.
We did it! We cured all four diseases!
We won! That was so much fun!
I know, right? I'm so glad we played.
Me too. We should do it again sometime.
Definitely.
